item.description:
Hi....

Here's the website: http://braintreegolf....

We have two tee times: 11:44am and 11:52am. I'll be at the Golf/Pro Shop around 11:00am. I'm thinking that, since we have two groups going out; we should all meet earlier....say...around 11am....at the Golf/Pro Shop to figure out who's going out first and second. Also, we could sit and chat for a short while before playing.

I'll call Braintree tomorrow to see if there's a discount available for an extra nine holes.

So, does everyone like this plan? I'm open to any suggestions.

Actually, I have one. It can be helpful to have a cell phone number to keep in touch....in case anyone's lost or running late. I know it's not the most popular idea to share cell numbers. You can always call me to let me know what's happening.

See ya,

Jon

You can reach me at: 617-519-4141
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a sign that says "Boston MetroWest Meetup" ........
item.why: 'Cause the weather's warmin' up and the grass is turning green..........

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Braintree Municipal Golf Course
